pageContext.claim: “You hear a lot of different rumors. You hear rumors that he [Nicolas Maduro] was [ready to leave Venezuela]. You hear rumors that he was leaving a different way. I'm hearing rumors about Russia, and I'm hearing a lot about Cuba. And we'll do a very, very strong embargo and sanction on Cuba.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump characterized as rumors the reports that President Nicolas Maduro had come close to leaving Venezuela amid a burgeoning social upheaval, but those reports came from his own secretary of state and national security adviser.
